sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Caterpillar ( CAT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.1%.
Year to date, Caterpillar has lost about 9.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.8%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 10.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 0.7%, and American Express ( AXP ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
